title: [Bloodriven Village, Copper Road]
description: Thick oak poles form the framework and facade of a small tavern, while the rough boards of the walls still bear the greenish tinge of new lumber.  Trampled grasses attempt to maintain their claim on this once vacant lot, but the stamp of foot traffic proclaims it a lost battle.

Thick ribbon-latticed poles form the framework and facade of a small tavern, while the rough boards of the walls still bear the greenish tinge of new lumber.  Colorful spheres of thin glass dangle from ropes hoisted around the tavern, casting faint patterns with the ambient light.
